entry.title: New site
entry.summary:
I'm finally finding time to start straightening up my web presence, and step one involves updating this site. In the process, I'm setting up a blog. This includes a few of the old posts from my blogspot blog, as well as one post I wrote a year ago but apparently never posted.

More to come -- but if there's anything you've asked me for a link to, ask again and I'll put it up here.

entry.title: Math Jokes
entry.summary:
I saw these on mathoverflow:

  • The primary reason Bourbaki stopped writing books was the realization that Lang was one single person.
  • A paper should be like a miniskirt: short enough to be interesting and long enough to cover the subject.

entry.title: Great quote
entry.summary: From Chris: "apple is like the really hot girl u didnt know was whack"
